title: Name
description: The person name of the party.

prefix.description: The prefix, or title, to the party's name.

given_name.description: When the party is a person, the party's given, or first, name.

surname.description: When the party is a person, the party's surname or family name. Also known as the last name. Required when the party is a person. Use also to store multiple surnames including the matronymic, or mother's, surname. For surname, if a second surname is required in the region, e.g. in Mexico, it is recommended to use a double-space delimiter between the first surname and second surname, e.g. Rivera[ ][ ]Barientos, where [ ] represents a 0x20 space character.

middle_name.description: When the party is a person, the party's middle name. Use also to store multiple middle names including the patronymic, or father's, middle name.

suffix.description: The suffix for the party's name.

full_name.description: When the party is a person, the party's full name.
